name: 張國楨
objective: 使學生認知測量是各項工程建設的一項重要基礎性先行的工作，使能適應各項測量外業觀測、內業計算及繪圖等作業。課程概要如下：1)測量之基本概念、(2)各種測量儀器的認識與使用、(3)控制測量（括三角、三邊導線高程等)之施測方法及計算、(4)地形圖及地籍圖之測及應用、(5)各項工程放樣測量。
schedule:
1. Traverse
2. Traverse field notes
3. Traverse computation- balancing
4. Traverse computation- adjustment
5. Coordinate computation
6. Use of open traverse
7. Coordinate forms of equations
8. Intersection of a Line with a circle
9. Intersection of two circle
10. Three-point resection
11. Area calculation
12. Volume calculation
13. GPS-introdution
14. GPS- static survey
15. Kinematic GPS
16. Adjustments by least squares
17. Mapping survey, Mapping
18. Photogrammetry
materials:
1. elementary surveying, Charles d. Ghilani and Paul R. Wolf, Pearson International Edi.高立圖書
2. 測量學，葉怡成，東華書局
